attributes.action: Discuss the impact that Ofsted have on education staff
attributes.additional_details:
Review of Ofsted and their role within education
To make sure there is a duty of care to look after teaching/ back ground staff before / during and after Ofsted inspections
attributes.background: Health and well being of all teachers / back ground staff to be added to the Ofsted inspections.  With support in place in the education establishment does not come up to standard

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635055
